Question: Motivated to prove his worth, this person became the star of Laney's junior varsity squad, and tallied several 40-point games.
Hints: At 1:45, this person was intentionally fouled by the 76ers' Eric Snow, and stepped to the line to make both free throws.
This person was known throughout his career for being a strong clutch performer.
This person played on two Olympic gold medal-winning American basketball teams.
